attributes.action: Remove alan duncan as an mp
attributes.additional_details:
They hate anyone who has even got a hint of wealth in their life "
Alan duncan
attributes.background:
Alan duncan 
This man is an elected member of parliment and by definition is supposed to be representative of his electorate. By refering to some constituents as"they" he is showing himself to be of a moral standing that is unfit of an mp

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
